const Characters = (props) => { const { characters } = props; return (

Personajes

Volver a la home
{characters.map((character, index) => (

{character.name}

{character.status === 'Alive' ? <> Alive : <> Dead }

Episodios: {character.episode.length}

Especie: {character.species}

))}
Volver a la home
) } export default Characters;
